channel.title: 317 Trinity-Pkz Re-Release. ****NOT LEECHED**** Read Before Flaming!
channel.description:
Hello Everyone, I'm Releasing a Source Originally Created By Elite-Pkz, As well as the Client Originally Created by Bluurr. I take no Credit for what i have done, I redid some of the design in the interface on the client merely to make it look more appealing. The server side, I Fixed a few errors in the source, Moved the Home, Added new shops, As well as i added new Anti-Dupe and Anti-Null Codes. Hope you all enjoy this re-release.
--This Source includes working Quests, All quest items can be obtained without help!
--Training Isn't difficult, You can change xp rates if needed.
--This server was a great pking server when it was online, I hope someone will put it to good use!
--There are commands Such as ::giveadmin, ::givemod etc. Working donator status, Many other commands such as ::unmute ::unban ::unipban. All working commands.
--This server includes a Server control Panel, If you do not want it its simple to disable quickly, Merely go into the source files and remove ControlPanel.java, You can delete it or simply move it in case you want to use it in the future.
--Skills are almost all working, Runecrafting is not enabled at the time, All you need to do is add the runecrafting alters and a shop carrying essence, Or add a tele to the essence mines.
Here are some pictures---BELOW
LOGIN PAGE [img]http://www.trinity-pkz.at.ua/0030.png[/img] HOME--Right in Varrock Central [img]http://www.trinity-pkz.at.ua/0034.png[/img] PORTALS--Portals to KBD, New Training Area, And Dommik Who drops Vestas! [img]http://www.trinity-pkz.at.ua/0035.png[/img] THIEVING--Thieving area right next to home, No senseless teleing around! [img]http://www.trinity-pkz.at.ua/0036.png[/img] NEW INTERFACE DESIGNS----TWO PICTURES BELOW [img]http://www.trinity-pkz.at.ua/0037.png[/img] [img]http://www.trinity-pkz.at.ua/0038.png[/img]
THIS SERVER IS IN NO WAY LEECHED SO DO NOT POST ON HERE SAYING LEECH I WILL COME TO YOUR HOME AND SLAP YOU SENSELESS..... :D DOWNLOADS ARE BELOW---
================================= ===========MEGAUPLOAD============ ================================= [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=SQIT57MB]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=SQIT57MB[/url] ================================= ===========FILEFRONT============== ================================= [url=http://www.filefront.com/15513581/Client+Source.rar]]http://www.filefront.com/15513581/Client+Source.rar][/url] =================================

@kingtren wrote:

Hello Everyone, I’m Releasing a Source Originally Created By Elite-Pkz, As well as the Client Originally Created by Bluurr. I take no Credit for what i have done, I redid some of the design in the interface on the client merely to make it look more appealing. The server side, I Fixed a few errors in the source, Moved the Home, Added new shops, As well as i added new Anti-Dupe and Anti-Null Codes. Hope you all enjoy this re-release.

–This Source includes working Quests, All quest items can be obtained without help!

–Training Isn’t difficult, You can change xp rates if needed.

–This server was a great pking server when it was online, I hope someone will put it
to good use!

–There are commands Such as ::giveadmin, ::givemod etc. Working donator status,
Many other commands such as ::unmute ::unban ::unipban. All working commands.

–This server includes a Server control Panel, If you do not want it its simple to disable
quickly, Merely go into the source files and remove ControlPanel.java, You can delete
it or simply move it in case you want to use it in the future.

–Skills are almost all working, Runecrafting is not enabled at the time, All you need to do
is add the runecrafting alters and a shop carrying essence, Or add a tele to the essence
mines.

Here are some pictures—BELOW

LOGIN PAGE

HOME–Right in Varrock Central

PORTALS–Portals to KBD, New Training Area, And Dommik Who drops Vestas!

THIEVING–Thieving area right next to home, No senseless teleing around!
